tool_description: Extracts and filters transaction data from payment processing systems within specified date ranges and criteria.

start_date.description: Start date for transaction extraction (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date for transaction extraction (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 2 years.
Invalid transaction types: Use only [sale, refund, chargeback, fee, authorization, capture].
Invalid amount filter: min_amount must be a non-negative number.
Invalid currency codes: Use valid 3-letter ISO 4217 currency codes.
usage: Specify start_date and end_date, optionally filter by transaction_types, min_amount, and currency_codes to extract relevant transaction data for analysis.

date_range.description: Actual date range of extracted data

data_summary.description: Summary of extracted transaction data characteristics
